name: Indie Dev Tycoon
description:
Form your own Indie Game Studio and start developing your own game concepts or fulfill contracs to earn Money. 

Indie Dev Tycoon is an early prototype of an idea I had stuck in my head for a long time. It was created as part of my "one game a week" challenge. Right now it's not planned to continue the development of this game. Nevertheless I highly appreciate recommendations for changes, critics and of course bug reports. Hope you enjoy this small game.
